text: this is pirate Pete he is a little boy
pirate Pete where the nappy underneath
his big pirate trousers he uses nappies
to do wheeze and puzan this is pirate
Pete's family they don't wear nappies
only pirate Pete and his baby brother
wear nappies it's all right for the baby
to wear nappies thinks pirate Pete but I
want to be more grown-up than that
so pirate Pete and his mummy go down to
the pirate store to see what they can
find first they look for a potty which
one do you think pirate Pete likes best
which is your favorite pirate Pete is
excited by his new potty but just what
is a potty for again is it a funny hat a
toy boat a very useful storage box your
potty is for doing your wheeze and puzan
instead of in your nappy explains mummy
this seems funny up first so pirate Pete
practices sitting on his potty just to

next pirate Pete chooses some grown-up
pirate pants which ones do you think
pirate Pete likes best
which are your favorites pirate Pete
feels grown up in his special big-boy
pants
he practices pulling them up and down
this is easy thinks pirate Pete so the
next time he feels like he needs to
wheel poo he sits on his potty he sits
and he sits and he sits and he sits
until finally a teeny tiny little weed
comes out and tinkles into the bottom of
the potty pirate Pete's mummy then
teaches Pete's and special pirate potty
rules one after you have used your potty
especially for a poo remember to ask
mummy or daddy to help you wipe your
bottom with toilet paper always wipe
from front to back to flush it all away
in the toilet it might make a loud noise
but that's just lots of water making the
toilet clean again 3
then you should wash and dry your hands
sometimes however pirate Pete can't get
to the potty in time and accidentally
makes a mess on the floor
don't worry Pete his mummy and daddy
always say we know you're trying hard
we still think you're a very clever boy
soon pirate pizzas used to doing away in
his potty but he finds doing a poem much
harder
it feels so funny without a nappy on but
he keeps on trying until one day pirate
Pete manages to do a poo right in his
potty he shows the full potty to his
mummy he shows it to his daddy he shows
it to his big sister and even to the
baby how they all cheer pirate Pete
feels like a proper grown-up pirate now
only the baby still wears nappies but
one day Pete's little brother will have
a potty adventure of his own and Pete
will be able to show him just what to do
